clinical_study.brief_title: The Application of Evidence-Based Chinese Complementary and Alternative Medicine (CAM) in Hospice Palliative Care in Taiwan
clinical_study.official_title: The Application of Evidence-Based Chinese Complementary and Alternative Medicine (CAM) in Hospice Palliative Care in Taiwan-The Second and Third Year Project.

brief_summary.textblock: The study aims to explore the effects of silver spike point (SSP) treatment on common symptoms including pain, breathlessness, nausea/vomiting, dry mouth etc. of terminal cancer patients.

detailed_description.textblock: The study aims to explore the effects of silver spike point treatment on common symptoms including pain, breathlessness, nausea/vomiting, dry mouth etc. of terminal cancer patients. We will conducted a pilot study to evaluate the effects on different symptoms and then a prospective study will be conducted after validation of major effects.

primary_outcome.description: Questionnaire for evaluating the severity of symptoms

secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire for evaluating quality of life

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Cancer patients
- Competent with clear consciousness
- With symptoms of pain, breathlessness, nause/vomiting, dry mouth, generalized discomfort
- Expected life span of at least 1 week
Exclusion Criteria:
- With implanted devices
- Not having clear consciousness
- Expected life span less than 1 week
- Foreigner

overall_official.affiliation: Taipei Veterans General Hospital, Taipei, Taiwan
